name: Alluo
description: Alluo is cross-chain yield optimisation and liquidity direction protocol that enables the Alluo non-cusotidal mobile app users to earn a great yield on the 3 major stablecoins. The stable coins can be deposited or purchased via a series of onramp in our mobile app. The protocol is governed by the $ALLUO token, which can be staked to earn rewards for participaing in our governance liquidity direction process.
